Top 10 Schools Of Nepal 2022

Welcome to our comprehensive guide to the top 10 schools in Nepal! Choosing the right school for your child is an important decision, and our expert team has curated this list of Nepal's finest educational institutions to help make the decision easier. Our selection features schools renowned for their academic excellence, innovative teaching methods, and exceptional facilities. From traditional boarding schools to modern international institutions, our list offers a range of options for parents and students to choose from.

At each of these schools, students receive a holistic education that focuses on both academic and personal growth. The schools provide a nurturing environment where students can develop their passions and interests through extracurricular activities, sports, and clubs. The faculty at these institutions are dedicated and experienced, and use innovative teaching methods to help students succeed in their academic pursuits. Whether you're looking for a school that focuses on STEM subjects, the arts, or humanities, our list has something for everyone. We have included detailed information about each school, including their history, curriculum, extracurricular offerings, and facilities. You can also read reviews and testimonials from current and former students to get an inside look at each institution.

We understand that choosing a school is a big decision, and we hope that our list will help make the decision easier for you. Explore our selection of Nepal's top schools and find the perfect fit for your child's future.

10. Little Angels College of Management (LACM)

Little Angels College of Management (LACM) is a renowned educational institution located in the beautiful city of Kathmandu, Nepal. Established in 2007, LACM is a private college that offers a range of undergraduate and graduate programs in management studies. It is affiliated with Tribhuvan University and is recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC) of Nepal. LACM is committed to providing quality education that empowers students with knowledge, skills, and values that prepare them for successful careers in the dynamic world of business and management. The college has a team of experienced and dedicated faculty members who use innovative teaching methodologies to impart practical and theoretical knowledge to students. The curriculum is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of various aspects of management such as finance, marketing, human resource management, and entrepreneurship.

The college has state-of-the-art infrastructure and facilities that create a conducive learning environment for students. It has a well-equipped library with a vast collection of books, journals, and digital resources. The college also provides computer labs, Wi-Fi connectivity, and multimedia classrooms that facilitate the teaching-learning process. LACM has an active student community that organizes various extracurricular activities such as sports, cultural events, and business competitions that provide students with opportunities to develop leadership, teamwork, and communication skills. Summary, Little Angels College of Management is an excellent institution that offers quality education in management studies and prepares students for successful careers in the global business world.

Further Details

Approximate Fees: 50000 per month

Location: Hattiban, Lalitpur

Official Website: Blahblah

Google Maps: View on google maps
